original: @116b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @116b # // rgya gar skad du /

original: krishna ya m'a ri rakta ya m'a ri shtsa p'u dza bi dhi:/
analyzed: krishna ya m'a ri rakta ya m'a ri shtsa p'u dza bi dhi:/

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽The Ritual of Offering to Black and Red Yamāri

original: gshin rje gshed nag po dang dmar po mchod pa'i cho ga / dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gshin rje gshed nag po dang dmar po mchod pa'i cho ga / dpal gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: de nas bzlas pa rjes su dran par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas bzlas pa rjes su dran par bya ste /
translated: Then one should recollect the recitation.

original: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom hr'i:shtri:wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hṛiḥ śrīḥ vikṛtānana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: snying po'i sngags so //
analyzed: snying po'i sngags so //

original: aom hr'i: k'a la r'u pa h'um kham ;
analyzed: aom hr'i: k'a la r'u pa h'um kham ;

original: nye ba'i snying po'o //
analyzed: nye ba'i snying po'o //

original: aom hr'i: bhr'um shr'um h'um ka: snying po phyi ma'o //🔽aom hr'i: ha: bho ma h'a kro dha a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha /
analyzed: aom hr'i: bhr'um shr'um h'um ka: snying po phyi ma'o // aom hr'i: ha: bho ma h'a kro dha a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha /
translated: Oṃ hṛiḥ bhruṃ śruṃ hūṃ kaḥ is the later essence.

original: aasm'at p'u dza pra ti gri hna pra s'a dham me dhi man ku ru sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aasm'at p'u dza pra ti gri hna pra s'a dham me dhi man ku ru sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hṛiḥ haḥ bho mahākrodha āgacchāgacchāsamāpta pūja pratigṛhaṇa prasādhaya medhiman kuru svāhā.

original: spyan drang ba'o //
analyzed: spyan drang ba'o //

original: aom hr'i: shtri: a'a mchod yon no //
analyzed: aom hr'i: shtri: a'a mchod yon no //
translated: Oṃ hṛiḥ śrīḥ ā is the offering water.

original: aom h'um h'um phat phat /
analyzed: aom h'um h'um phat phat /

original: zhabs bsil ba'o //
analyzed: zhabs bsil ba'o //

analyzed: aom wi kri t'a na na dushta satva da ma ka ga: ga: dri'i sngags so //

original: me tog dbul ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: me tog dbul ba'i sngags so //

original: aom hr'i:ha:he phat /
analyzed: aom hr'i:ha:he phat /

original: bdug spos so //
analyzed: bdug spos so //

original: aom k'a la r'u pa sarba dusht'am satva da ma ka ma h'a bh'u ta pa ti //

original: ai mam ba lim grihn'a pa ya sv'a h'a /

analyzed: gtor ma'i sngags so //

analyzed: mar me'i sngags so //

analyzed: aom dza ya dza ya /
